name: Now We Duel
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Enjoy flying around

Simple remake of the old Amiga game Biplane Duel where the whole aim is to fly around the screen against an opponent. You can play against a basic computer opponent or a second player using the keyboard.

Keyboard Controls

   O - Switch between Human and Computer opponent for Player 2

Player 1:

   Left/Right - Turn the biplane

   Down - Shoot

Player 2:

   A/D - Turn the biplane

   S - Shoot
